Name: Peach '15
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of peach slices and mint sprigs.
Garnish with peach slices and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Long, slightly sweet and very peachy
History: Created in 2015 by Giovanni Bonizzoni, Italy
Nutrition: One serving of Peach '15 contains 157 calories
